description:
Welcome to another event in the PyMCon Web Series.
To learn about upcoming events check out the website: https://pymcon.com/events/

In this PyMCon Web Series event join Todd Hendricks as he explores the application of Bayesian statistical models in safeguarding voting rights. Discover the strategies used to overcome challenges posed by small datasets and witness the resolution of the ecological inference problem. Gain valuable insights into running analyses, informing lawyers, and the profound societal impact of these models. 

For more detailed information
🔗 Visit the Discourse post: https://discourse.pymc.io/t/12131
🌐 Explore the official website: https://pymcon.com


📢 PyMCon is a community conference that shares the latest in statistical practices, tricks, and tips. Submit your proposal for the PyMCon Web Series CFP and be part of this exciting community.  Submit your proposal here: https://pymcon.com/cfp/

📧 Join the PyMCon mailing list to stay up-to-date on the latest news, insights, and announcements. 🔗 Join the mailing list here: https://dashboard.mailerlite.com/forms/241188/73241617305175542/share

🤝 Connect with us on Discourse and Meetup and be part of a vibrant community of statisticians, data analysts, and enthusiasts.
🔗 Discourse: https://discourse.pymc.io
🔗 Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup

#pymcon #pymc #votingrights #statistics #hierarchicalbinomialdistributions #interview #dataanalysis
title: PyMCon Web Series - Protecting Voting Rights with PyMC - Q&A | Todd Hendricks
